summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the outside temperature (up 3.4°C) and feels like temperature (up 1.8°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), cloud levels (down 107 m), and light levels (down 2965 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; heat will be very noticeable, though not extreme. Also, very sticky and muggy conditions are expected and a light breeze will be noticeable. Showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and strong and powerful sunlight. Weather patterns to stay the same.
